app.title: Supplementary Materials
app.p: The following are available online at http://www.mdpi.com/1999-4915/10/10/560/s1, Figure S1: Dynamic version of Figure 2. Figure S2: Dynamic version of Figure 5. The dynamic versions of these figures allow the reader to rotate and zoom the polymerase structures in real time in a normal web browser window. The supplemental figures have multiple ‘scenes’ that correspond to the panels shown within each printed figure, and the same figure legends apply.
